text: Devid sịrị Ahimelek onye Het, na Abishai, nwa Zeruaya26:6 Zeruya bụ nwanne nwanyị Devid, onye toro ya nʼusoro ọmụmụ ha. Nke a dị nʼakwụkwọ 1Ih 2:16 Abishai na Joab, ndị bụ ndị ndu ndị agha, tinyere Asahel, bụ ụmụ nwanne nwanyị Devid, nʼihi na ọ bụ Zeruya mụrụ ha, gụọ nke a nʼakwụkwọ 2Sa 2:13,18,24 onye bụ nwanne Joab, “Onye ga-eso m gaa nʼogige ebe Sọl na ndị agha ya mara ụlọ ikwu ha?”
